title: The 77th Anniversary, Halal Food Festival in Anniversary Celebration of Hua-Shih College of Education清真美食饗宴-花師教育學院77周年慶活動
content:
分類： 行政公告, 活動公告, 其他公告
來源： 花師教育學院 - 賴小姐 - tll@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話(03)890-3804
對象： 全校教職員
標題： The 77th Anniversary, Halal Food Festival in Anniversary Celebration of Hua-Shih College of Education清真美食饗宴-花師教育學院77周年慶活動
日期： Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:01:51 +0800
附檔： 海報（英文）.jpg (283 KB)   海報（中文）.jpg (267 KB)   
Dear all，
We are joyful to announce that the 77th Anniversary of Hua-Shih Education College is coming✨✨✨

In order to encourage Cross-cultural exchange and learning between international students and local students, we’ve organized an event called “Halal Food Festival”.
🥳

In this event, we are very excited to invite sisters from Southeast Asian immigrant families, migrant worker families, and international students in Hualien to become chefs together, bringing the taste of their hometown to everyone.

We sincerely invite you to participate in this “Halal Food Festival”, and learn about the diverse cultures of Asia.

There are only 25 places available. Sign up now to reserve your spot📝

📍Date and Time：Oct. 21st, 11 A.M.-13 P.M.
📍Location: The Glass House in College of Hua-Shih College of Education
📍Registration link: https://forms.gle/EXmn7bQgeyKqmJtN7

📍Organizer: College of Hua-Shih College of Education
📍implement: Student of Graduate Program of Multicultural Education Education, Multicultural Education Center.
📍Cooperative organization: Hualien County Nou-Li Community Interchange Association


各位，
我們很高興地宣布，花師教育學院七十七週年校慶即將來臨✨✨
為了鼓勵國際學生和本地學生之間的跨文化交流和學習，辦理「清真美食節」的活動。這次活動，我們很高興邀請來自東南亞移民家庭、移工家庭、學院的國際學生一起當廚師，把家鄉的味道帶給大家。

我們誠摯邀請您參加本次“清真美食節”，了解亞洲多元文化。
**僅有25個名額。立即報名以預留席位📝**

📍日期和時間：113年10月21 日上午 11 點至下午 13 點
📍地點：花師教育學院玻璃屋
📍報名連結：https://forms.gle/EXmn7bQgeyKqmJtN7 
📍主辦單位：花師教育學院
📍實施單位：多元文化教育中心、多元文化教育碩博班學生會
📍合作機構：社團法人花蓮縣牛犁社區交流協會
